import React from "react"; function AddClass (e) { const tabs = document.getElementsByClassName('tablinks'); const pages = document.getElementsByClassName('tabcontent') for (let i = 0; i < tabs.length; i++) { if(tabs[i].id == e.target.id){ tabs[i].classList.add('active'); pages[i].style.display = 'block'; } else{ tabs[i].classList.remove('active'); pages[i].style.display = 'none' } } console.log(pages); } export default function Donate() { return (

Donate

You’ll have the opportunity to be part of our ongoing mission. Every euro or item you donate to Stellar Sound Podcast will be used to build more space for the creative and unique music artists.

Watch WHY you should donate...

United to collaborate, create, be bold and free.

... Watch HOW to donate

Pay via our Stellar PayPal any amount.

By joining us, you’ll not only support a bunch of incredibly talented musicians; you’ll also become part of the exclusive Patreon Discord community.

Are your musical instruments collecting dust? Or are you maybe a good willed artist wanting to give away some of your old recording devices?
